aka: Michael J Fox: Actor Activist Optimist
米高J霍士：演員樂觀活動家(港)

cast.name: 迈克尔·J·福克斯 Michael J. Fox

this_title: Michael J Fox: Actor, Activist, Optimist
trans_title: Michael J Fox: Actor Activist Optimist
米高J霍士：演員樂觀活動家(港)
introduction: No one could predict the kind of life Michael J Fox would live. From his meteoric rise to movie stardom to the tragedy of contracting Parkinson's at just 29, his life, in a way, has been a movie in itself.
chinese_title: Michael J Fox: Actor, Activist, Optimist
